name: Snort
description:
Snort is a free open source network intrusion detection system (IDS) and intrusion prevention system (IPS) created in 1998 by Martin Roesch, former founder and CTO of Sourcefire.
#### License:
* GPLv2+ 
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default 2vCPU, 4 GB RAM.
#### Resources Installed:
* Snort 2.9.12-1
* DAQ-2.0.6-1
#### Operating System:
* CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Lifecycle:
* NA
#### Limitations:
* No lifecycle management actions.
* Single VM Snort Instance. HA not available.
* Not recommended for the production use. 
#### Other Instructions:
* Open required ports under Firewall/Security group.
author: Nutanix
